scripts.copy-config: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const srcPath = path.join(__dirname, 'config.json'); const destPath = path.join(__dirname, 'scripts/etl/config.json'); fs.copyFileSync(srcPath, destPath); console.log('config.json copied to scripts/etl');"
scripts.deploy: npm run copy-config && npm run etl-package && node scripts/deploy.js
